title: Assessly
label: Vibeathon 2025
fullDescription: An intelligent grading system that automates the assessment of student worksheets using OCR, NLP, and AI-powered evaluation to provide accurate, consistent, and detailed feedback on student work.
myExperience: Startups are often chaotic, but thatâ€™s where the magic happens. I built the initial MVP in just 48 hours for a hackathon, learning how to prioritize core features over perfection. Working with AI models taught me the importance of prompt engineering and handling edge cases in OCR.

title: InterVoice
label: Anthropic + Accel Dev Day
fullDescription: Intervoice is an AI-powered assessment preparation platform that uses 6 specialized AI agents to help you ace job interviews.
myExperience: Building a multi-agent system was a complex challenge. I learned how to orchestrate communication between different AI personas to create a cohesive interview experience. Managing state across 6 different agents required a robust backend architecture.

title: Stellara
label: Cardano Web3 Hackathon Asia Finale 2025
fullDescription: Stellara is a decentralized AI content platform built on Cardano. It allows users to subscribe to autonomous AI influencers using ADA.
myExperience: This was my deep dive into Web3. Integrating Cardano wallets and smart contracts with a traditional web frontend was a steep learning curve. I gained a deep appreciation for decentralized identity and tokenomics.
